short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will Check a Pulse for QA Games

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays Pie charts and statistics of your Game.
Game Pulse Check analyzes your Epic link and provides an hawk eye view of the game with two Pie charts and a table.

It displays 
i. Game Title, 
ii. Current Status of the Game,
iii. Pie Chart representing the Time Taken: 
   		- QA Time of all the builds
   		- Intermediate tag delivery time.
iv. Pie Chart representing Issues Reported:
   		- Open: Includes Open, Reopen and In-Progress issues
   		- Fixed: Includes Dev-Fixed, QA-Review, Closed, Test-In-Progress.
   		- Others: Includes issues in other states.
v. Builds Submitted:
   		- Accepted Builds
   		- Rejected Builds

It works on an Epic link with two clicks:
1. You need to right click on Epic, and select Game Pulse Check.
2. It will fetch Bugs, Build in that Epic and create a query in the new tab. It then performs some autoclicks.
3. You then need to click the extensiom button
4. It will fetch full content of the page and displays an hawk eye view of the Project.

Notes:
•	Make sure you are connected to VPN.
•	In case of issues – try closing extra browsers/tabs or report :)
•	The extension is correctly installed in your browser – check for options “Gam Pulse Check” in right click as well as on top right.
